Title: A Room with a View
Plot: When Lucy Honeychurch (Helena Bonham Carter) and chaperone Charlotte Bartlett (Dame Maggie Smith) find themselves in Florence with rooms without views, fellow guests Mr. Emerson (Denholm Elliott) and son George (Julian Sands) step in to remedy the situation. Meeting the Emersons could change Lucy's life forever, but once back in England, how will her experiences in Tuscany affect her marriage plans?
Stars: Maggie Smith, Helena Bonham Carter, Denholm Elliott, Julian Sands

ActorList.Name: Helena Bonham Carter
ActorList.AsCharacter: Lucy Honeychurch, Miss Bartlett's cousin and charge (as Helena Bonham-Carter)

ActorList.Name: Patrick Godfrey
ActorList.AsCharacter: The Reverend Mr Eager, Chaplain of the Anglican Church in Florence

Companies: Goldcrest Films International, National Film Finance Corporation (NFFC), Curzon Film Distributors
Tagline: From Merchant-Ivory, the team who brought you "THE EUROPEANS" and "HEAT AND DUST" comes a brilliant movie adaptation of E.M. Forster's classic novel "A ROOM WITH A VIEW"
Keywords: male nudity,nude bathing,pubic hair,male pubic hair,self discovery

Similars.Title: The Wings of the Dove
Similars.Plot: An impoverished woman who has been forced to choose between a privileged life with her wealthy aunt and her journalist lover, befriends an American heiress. When she discovers the heiress is attracted to her own lover and is dying, she sees a chance to have both the privileged life she cannot give up and the lover she cannot live without.
Similars.Stars: Helena Bonham Carter, Linus Roache, Alex Jennings
